paper.title: Black Magic Meta Data - get a glimpse behind the scene
paper.abstract: This paper presents how we utilise natural language processing techniques in order to automagically classify information stored in a CRIS, and aggregate the information in a researchers portfolio into a fingerprint describing a researchers research interest. Our approach exploits the fact that entities in a CRIS typically include some kind of text - most notable example being publication abstracts. We explain how the approach can result in automatic detailed classification of information, and argue how we can take advantage of such information in order to facilitate networking. Finally, we describe how we have realised the solution within our CRIS system. (C) 2014 Elsevier B.V

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要探讨利用自然语言处理技术对CRIS系统中的信息进行分类和聚合，以描述研究者的研究兴趣，并未提及任何与衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理相关的应用。
